Html:
I am scraping a few prices from m.homedepot.com and the site prompts to allow it to determine my location. While I don't care, this seems to be a sticking point for getting search results back.

On my Win 7 PC/MVC 4 application it works fine on and retrieves and parses the page. When I publish to my web server, it fails to find a result using the same URI.

Example: http://m.homedepot.com/s/181889/


Other things: on the server, if I browse directly to the page above with cookies disabled, I get no result, however if I enable cookies and location detection, search works fine.

Problem: how do I get this URI to find results on a server that must not allow an application to create cookies. Yes I have tried creating a cookie container, but maybe I am doing it wrong. (Obviously)

Thanks for any help.
